column2: "What, you think you can take your Hunter mojo to a whole other level?"
"Well, you're gonna have to prove it to me. I mean, that's what the mutual evaluation system's all about, right?"
"The test is plain and simple. All you've got to do is complete all the tasks I give you."
"But this one's no piece of cake. I'm not gonna make it easy for you."
"Remember, no fear, ever. And always stay cool. C'mon, you'll never know until you try."
